question: {name} is trying to decide whether to do {task} herself or hire {profession}. If she does them herself, she'll be able to do {n} fewer hours of {work_type} work, losing {cur}{rate}/hour in missed income. Additionally, if she does {task} herself, she'll need to spend {extra} hours mailing the completed tax documents, further reducing her {work_type} time. {profession} charges {cur}{fee}. How much more money will she have if she hires {profession}?
